A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very critic who lied in their review for political reasons should be fired. This movie was a violent\, intentional assault on the franchise\, haphazardly\, yet methodically destroying everything good about the Star Wars Saga\, leaving it in smoking ruins. Halfway through this dismantling of the franchise\, I was brought to tears\, feeling like a dear friend had died. I will never see another new Star Wars movie again as long as the hateful monsters running it are still at the smoking helm.
